amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Systems by $3,215,910 and reduces funds for Department of Veterans Affairs General Administration by a similar amount in order to redirect funds towards veterans' services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Systems by $3,215,910 and to reduce funds for Department of Veterans Affairs General Administration by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
